FedEx $FDX infrastructure milestone in 2025:

700 aircraft in fleet, handling 18M packages daily.

Major hub: 🇺🇸Memphis, TN – 4M sq ft sorting facility.

🇺🇸 Large metros: Last-mile delivery costs $15 per parcel in 2025.

🇮🇳 Large metros: $0.75 per parcel.

Projections show US costs rising 8% annually through 2030 due to urban congestion and labor shortages, while India's efficient density model holds costs steady.
category: last-mile delivery costs per parcel in large metros
